analysis.description:
BitUPToken.releaseTeamTokensAfter6Months (/unique_chucks/2/0xb2e260f12406c401874ecc960893c0f74cd6afcd.sol#311-319) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-teamSupply.sub(teamSupply6Months) (/unique_chucks/2/0xb2e260f12406c401874ecc960893c0f74cd6afcd.sol#318-319)

BitUPToken.releaseTeamTokensAfter12Months (/unique_chucks/2/0xb2e260f12406c401874ecc960893c0f74cd6afcd.sol#323-332) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-teamSupply.sub(teamSupply12Months) (/unique_chucks/2/0xb2e260f12406c401874ecc960893c0f74cd6afcd.sol#330-331)

BitUPToken.releaseTeamTokensAfter18Months (/unique_chucks/2/0xb2e260f12406c401874ecc960893c0f74cd6afcd.sol#335-344) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-teamSupply.sub(teamSupply18Months) (/unique_chucks/2/0xb2e260f12406c401874ecc960893c0f74cd6afcd.sol#342-343)

BitUPToken.releaseTeamTokensAfter24Months (/unique_chucks/2/0xb2e260f12406c401874ecc960893c0f74cd6afcd.sol#348-359) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-teamSupply.sub(teamSupply24Months) (/unique_chucks/2/0xb2e260f12406c401874ecc960893c0f74cd6afcd.sol#356-358)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/2/0xb2e260f12406c401874ecc960893c0f74cd6afcd.sol:
